ae687b36-a024-41c4-aef6-83ab082bdf6c: A dragon is a reptilelike creature, usually winged, with magical or unusual abilities.
34864416-50f4-4eed-8c38-158cc38e6084: A rebel and a fighter for freedom and good, the Azata acts on instinct and trusts in spontaneous decisions. The Azata easily befriends those who don't fit into the neat ranks of the official crusade, and does not issue commands, but rather inspires allies to fight.
62c660b2-0f8a-4583-81ed-b17aee62630d: An enemy has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} or be ensnared in tree roots. While in this state, the enemy cannot move, and has a 50% miss chance on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, as if all their opponents had total {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} enemy tries to pass another Reflex saving throw to break free. If the save fails, the enemy suffers ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} + half the Azata's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g}.
bbfae127-4158-4541-a2e6-9e8f62eb85b6: At 3rd rank, Azata gets a Dragon as an animal companion. Unlike normal animals of its kind, an animal companion's {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g}, abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} advance as the Azata gains mythic ranks.
838132be-d424-4bd5-9682-3a7944f082fe: Azata can choose from her superpowers to enhance herself.
c481b45c-834f-4035-885d-d7b16ece8698: Azata can decide to lose the advantages of Incredible Might to instead bolster the physical abilities of companions. They gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} equal to +1 per 2 Azata's mythic ranks.
b57c0c5a-c278-4dd9-a6e1-aa8721872b25: Azata can grant one companion immunity to {g|ConditionProne}prone{/g} condition and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}combat maneuvers{/g} for one {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. If the affected companion was critically hit, they are also affected with the effect of the blink effect for one round per 4 Azata's caster levels.
d91f67ec-f2c3-4636-afaf-8f64f1a832e9: Azata channels positive energy that {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cures{/g} all allies in a 30-foot area for ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g} +1 per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, and grants them randomly an effect from one of her following {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}: Rejuvenating Poem, Optimistic Smile or Believe in Yourself
615142f8-387c-45c7-8243-54ecc72171a8: Azata chooses one teamwork {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} during this and next mythic rank up. She shares the effects of all teamwork feats she has with allies within a 50-foot area. Azata's {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} inspires her allies so much that even when their {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} drop below 0 they continue to fight, even though they are still considered dead (or {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}) for all effects and can be {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cured{/g} by {g|SpellsBreathOfLife}breath of life{/g} or similar {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} as per spell description. After the encounter or upon receiving a total number of {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} equal to Azata's Charisma ability modifier shared among all allies, the allies in this state fall dead (or unconscious). If all of the Azata's allies die that way, she becomes fully drained and dies.
10d63211-518d-4751-893f-fca4febf2e76: Azata covers herself in flowers with tiny bees. She gets {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/Adamantine. Any creature that makes a successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} against Azata takes ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} + her {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g}.
fc867034-7128-4796-b267-70ccf788b084: Azata creates a 15-foot cone of wind dealing ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} + her {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} to all enemies inside it. Every affected enemy has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} or become disoriented and unable to cast any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} for 1d3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
003e0019-7cf9-43fd-af02-9e844beee5bd: Azata creates a 30-foot area of blossoming flowers. They entangle and calm enemies, enemies have to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g}. They try to pass a saving throw each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} while they are within the affected area. If the enemy failed the saving throw the first time, they are distracted by flowers. Distracted enemies receive a -2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. If the enemy failed the saving throw the second time, the enemy become {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g}. If the enemy failed the saving throw the third time, the enemy falls asleep for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} rounds. After the enemy awakes from sleep, he is immune to being staggered or fall asleep from this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} but still suffers the penalties.
8e27f81e-2513-46e3-8f5f-e920dc420337: Azata creates a 30-foot cone of leaves that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing damage{/g} per 2 caster levels to all creatures within the cone. A creature who suffers {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} or become intoxicated for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. Whenever the creature under this effect makes a roll, it rolls twice and chooses the worst result. A successful saving throw reduces the duration of this effect to 1 round.
17e2bc10-c085-46ba-824a-1cfa937c4be9: Azata creates a 30-foot cone of water dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}. Affected enemy has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} or be pushed away 10 feet away and then knocked down. If the affected creature passes its saving throw, it is only pushed away for 5 feet and becomes {g|ConditionSlowed}slowed{/g} down for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
00078192-9808-4b0e-9a15-3f7b488744da: Azata creates a rainbow arrow that jumps from target to target up to one time per 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d12{/g} per 2 caster levels {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with one energy randomly chosen between acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sound.
29af869a-727b-488e-b3f4-0bbac2482ecf: Azata creates a waterfall, the affected creature suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per 4 Azata's caster levels and has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} or be knocked down for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Vulnerability}vulnerable{/g} to cold for 1 minute per Azata's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
9cb6d44d-7b82-4653-aede-5504b9e44dd4: Azata creates bolts that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} per 2 caster levels to all adjacent creatures and half her {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} sonic damage to all creatures in a 10-foot area.
637776ea-3b33-494e-9a7b-4a387e662411: Azata creates nauseating plants in a 40-foot area for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}. Any creature within this area has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} or become {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g} and suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}acid damage{/g} every round. Every round creature tries to stop being nauseated by making further Fortitude saving throws. A successful save makes the creature immune to this effect until the end of the combat.
3c45c29a-139c-4dbf-8cc1-6b437a17d9ad: Azata envelops her and her companions in a shroud of swirling leaves. Under this effect, all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against Azata and her companions suffer a 50% miss chance. You become {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immune{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g}, whenever an enemy casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} against you, they suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} sonic damage per 5 Azata's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}.
a2b3079c-e7b7-4af6-8937-8c3846aa3583:
Azata gains a morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to her mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}. Whenever she hits with a charge attack or confirms a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g}, the target has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}, with {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} equal to 10 + your mythic rank + {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier. If the target fails a saving throw one of the following action happens at random:
Enemy is {g|ConditionStunned}stunned{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} (30%)
Enemy is {g|ConditionProne}prone{/g} for 1d4 rounds (20%)
Enemy is pushed away 15 feet and is stunned for 1d4 rounds (20%)
Enemy is crippled till the end of the fight: they can no longer move and suffers a -3 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to attack rolls and {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} (15%)
Enemy becomes {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g} (10%)
Enemy is killed (5%)
Additionally, Azata can decide to lose these advantages to instead bolster the physical abilities of companions. They gain a bonus on all attack and damage rolls equal to +1 per 2 Azata's mythic ranks.
7e3b0469-292e-40f5-a7a4-fe27dde88aff: Azata gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to her mythic rank to all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}. Whenever she makes a skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g}, she {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} the die twice, and chooses the best result. She also becomes proficient with all types of weapons and armor.
21f03fc8-d945-423b-b3f9-349ce59f2b8e: Azata gains {g|Encyclopedia:Fast_Healing}fast healing{/g} equal to half her mythic rank. From 4th mythic rank on, this number is increased by +5 per mythic rank. Whenever an enemy confirms a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} against Azata, her inner endurance is unleashed: she gets {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} per mythic rank, and if she has 25% or less hit points left, she gains {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/—.
9e473bfa-e530-465a-8b5f-866176e99553: Azata inspires party members. This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} grants party members a +4 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, and increase the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of their spells that require a Will saving throw by 2.
2cc25466-fefc-471a-8b99-b9760ce2af10: Azata invokes voices of a renewal. This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damages{/g} all enemies within a 30-foot area for ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} + 1 per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g}, while channeling positive energy that {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cures{/g} allies for (1d6 +1 per caster level) points of damage.
29dd7db5-4c58-477b-8313-57654d40cfa2:
Azata is always under the effect of {g|SpellsHaste}haste{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, as long as she is engaged in combat. All melee and ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against her have a 20% miss chance. All targeted {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Target}spells aimed{/g} at her have a 10% miss chance. All the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from area attacks against her is halved, even if previously reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g}.
Note: When character have miss chance and {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} at the same time, then only best bonus applied.
5fad6b83-655a-4c59-a440-86ebe90d01b3: Azata shouts out, dealing ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} + her {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} to all creatures within a 30-foot range. This shout encourages a revolt within the enemy ranks. All affected enemies have to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} or start to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} the strongest among them. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} they try to pass a new Will save to end the effect. If an enemy successfully saves and ends the Revolt effect, they suffer 4d6 + Azata's casting level sonic damage each round for 1d6 rounds as inner voices shout within making them regret what they had done.
ed14dd4a-4d58-4fb6-a5a0-08ea967bfef6: Azata starts a performance that grants a chosen companion {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/- and immunity to fear effects. All enemies in the 50-foot range from the Azata must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} or be forced to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} a chosen companion. Base {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
52deb998-d8df-41d9-b70d-6685d78e7556: Azata starts a performance that grants all allies within 50 feet a luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to half her mythic rank. Whenever an ally under this effect makes a successful saving throw, that ally is {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} + Azata's mythic rank.
228cc8d9-2935-404d-b762-178a4d2111f5: Azata starts a performance that grants all allies within 50 feet a {g|SpellsFreedomOfMovement}freedom of movement{/g} effect and immunity to compulsion {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g}.
841cf1f1-1dc0-49db-b832-d7bb1725367f: Azata starts a performance that grants all allies within 50 feet {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/{g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}lawful{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Regeneration}Regeneration{/g} 5 (lawful).
6c36ec23-552b-4219-b791-07603886bb62: Azata summons a wave of water. It deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}6d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} to all enemies in the area. Every affected enemy has to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} or be knocked down, {g|ConditionSlowed}slowed{/g} down and become vulnerable to bludgeoning {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} for 1d6 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. All allies affected by this wave are cleansed from all of the following conditions: {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}, {g|ConditionBlind}blinded{/g}, {g|ConditionConfusion}confused{/g}, {g|ConditionDazzled}dazzled{/g}, diseased, {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g}, {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigued{/g}, {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g}, poisoned, and {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g}.
4a107d57-9482-446f-a15e-6e8de3d2d65c: Azata summons the power of Life itself. Azata and her companions' {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} per 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} restores all companions spell slots up to 5th level, however it doesn't affect Azata's Mythic Spell book.
84eb8969-0027-4268-968b-2b7420b09879: Azata uses this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} to restore all companions' ability uses to the maximum amount.
b8442967-63e3-4bdd-8ff6-95d43db11ca1: Azata's dragon emits an aura of heroism. While she is alive, all allies are under a constant effect of the {g|SpellsHeroism}heroism{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
138db54a-0f35-4077-a852-6ea91fc11102: Azata's dragon's breath weapons don't affect allies.
37ca413a-5ef4-40fe-989c-6927d946c1c6: Azata's magic becomes incredibly more powerful. Whenever an enemy makes a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} against her {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}, they {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} the die twice and take the worst result. Whenever the Azata makes a {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration check{/g} or a {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, she rolls twice and takes the best result. If the Azata casts a spell whose description says that a successful saving throw halves its {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} or duration, it only decreases it by 25% instead.
24dce419-8170-414a-8e47-88bf9b14959d: Azata's smile encourages optimism. This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} removes all fear, {g|ConditionConfusion}confusion{/g}, compulsion, {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g}, and {g|ConditionFrightened}frightened{/g} effect from party members and grants an immunity to fear till the end of combat.
0049d9f7-50ac-40f0-8d8b-b38f5c2c867a: Breath Weapon — Ability is not ready yet
24a013d6-77be-4130-a658-28cc47af3d0c:
Mythic characters that draw their power from Freedom gain an ability to unleash a bolt of energy from Elysium itself, targeting an ally or a foe within 50 feet as a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. This bolt deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} plus 2d6 per mythic rank) points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to enemies. If used on allies, the bolt instead charges their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} with weapons for 2 + mythic rank {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. Companion's attacks with weapons deal an additional 2d6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g} on hit and count as {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good{/g} for the purposes of bypassing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. Those characters can use this ability 3 times per day plus one extra time for each mythic rank beyond the first.
On the 2nd mythic rank, those characters become closer to the azatas that live in Elysium, gaining {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} electricity 20 and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects.
75e6a932-ed15-44c7-9630-ad019e7fbcec: On the 2nd mythic rank, mythic characters that draw their power from Freedom become closer to the azatas that live in Elysium, gaining {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resist{/g} electricity 20 and +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects.
45de6634-80df-4d03-a6ae-9672e9956a4f: Once every {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, havoc dragon deals 2d10 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} to everyone in a in 30-foot cone. This {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases by 2d10 for every Azata mythic rank.
15e812a7-8397-40d0-8e72-28922e228492: Song of Courageous Defender — Choose Companion
eff530ca-9f68-4fde-83ff-d5cbe252e386: Summon Azata Ghaels and Astral Devas
ee7625bf-7566-41e7-8a19-079cfc6566d1: This ability summons a Azata Bralani for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
1df20472-312a-4411-a431-f2ea86013d82: This ability summons a Mastodon for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
c497a061-e870-49c9-ae71-a6c102f31cfe: This ability summons a Movanic Deva for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
182ca2f6-a381-473e-b6b9-9200ded51ef4: This ability summons a pair of Astral Devas for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
4af84b28-7018-4d29-9d3b-fc3d6031f0a7: This ability summons an Astral Deva for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
fbc8dc35-1ac3-4f79-99ae-0ec4b52ecaed: This ability summons an Azata Ghael for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
62d9dc74-f4ab-43c4-ac42-da36c8ccbe00: This ability summons {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d3{/g}+1 Azata Ghaels and a pair of Astral Devas for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
7e89492a-4d31-4d99-9300-d4954f3670e1: This ability summons {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d3{/g}+1 Hamadryads for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
0dbbf1dc-f468-4e36-bb6f-2bb9115199c3: This breath weapon deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d10{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} per mythic rank in 30-foot cone. Those caught in the area of the breath receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} for half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of this save is equal to 10 + half {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}HD{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Con{/g} modifier.
a8fab450-75ab-4f87-b634-d24630ecb656: This creature is {g|ConditionSlowed}slowed{/g} and vulnerable to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g}.
81b651db-ebbb-4c89-b8c2-4e2c53af7b62: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} affects all companions. It removes {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigue{/g}, {g|ConditionExhausted}exhaustion{/g}, all negative levels, restores all abilities and spell slots up to level 7. This spell doesn't affect Azata's Mythic Spellbook.
1169c08e-7704-4174-b328-cfe5bbd58fdf: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like {g|SpellsCallLightningStorm}call lightning storm{/g}, except Azata invokes a rainbow starfall. Every star deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} points of acid, cold, electricity, fire, or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g}, depending on the greatest potential {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (taking into consideration the target's immunities and energy {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistances{/g}). You may call a maximum of 15 stars.
d797ad46-e935-4bef-a14d-d5deabceae2a: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} grants the target a +1 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to chosen ability for each 4 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}.
387a4718-60e9-4ce2-bda3-aca1e3ccbea9: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} grants the target additional ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} + Azata's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} for their first weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} during a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to caster level {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}, a +2 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g}, and rises the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against all their spells and abilities by 2.
141b1573-db2a-4a5f-9406-3be9f73a2b3b: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} removes all negative levels from the target, while also granting them immunity to energy drain and mind-affecting effects for 1 min per Azata's {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}.
9533e3e7-7a28-40c0-abb3-195c4fe47a4b: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} removes {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigue{/g} and {g|ConditionExhausted}exhausted{/g} effects from all party members.
a5123752-7144-4983-ba59-2bec913704d1: Under the effect of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, all companions become immune to mind-affecting, charm, fear, compulsion, emotion, {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g}, {g|ConditionConfusion}confusion{/g} effects. They also get a +3 luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/- while they are in a 10-foot range from Azata.
54fedb4c-47e5-4b72-a354-3bbd91fcbdd1: Under this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} Azata and all her allies in 30 feet from her get a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} and to a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} confirmation {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} equal to +1 per 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}, as well as a bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to +1 per 6 caster levels the Azata possesses.
62cae637-6631-4609-af4f-d2f9dd7d8649: Whenever Azata casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that targets individual creatures, not areas, the spell affects one additional creature within a 30-foot range from the target. If the target is an enemy, the spell affects one additional enemy; if the target is an ally, the spell affects one additional ally. Additionally, spells that target enemies {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} them for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} + mythic rank.
3dffdfbf-a08b-45eb-8836-d7c58723df6f: Whenever an opponent with fewer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}hit dice{/g} than the dragon comes within a 30-foot range of the dragon, they must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}. If it fails, the opponent becomes {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g} (or, if they have less than 5 hit dice, panicked) for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}5d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. A successful saving throw makes the creature immune to this dragon's Frightful Presence for 24 hours. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.
0fb74e32-bc4d-40b9-8602-47aa534a9ae3: With this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, Azata chooses to create one of 5 possible 10-feet rainbow domes. While within it, party members get {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} either to fire, to cold, to acid, to electricity or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} by her choice.
c54c74a7-0456-409c-ada6-ebe2a43b0c0a: You may call down a rainbow star that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} points of acid, cold, electricity, fire, or {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g}, depending on the greatest potential {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} (taking into consideration the target's immunities and energy {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistances{/g}). The star falls down in a vertical stroke at whatever target point you choose within long range.
